org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Interface IAeProcessPlan

All Superinterfaces:
IAeContextWSDLProvider, IAeWSDLProvider
All Known Subinterfaces:
IAeProcessDeployment
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeProcessDeployment
public interface IAeProcessPlan
extends IAeContextWSDLProvider

Describes some basic characteristics of a process that we need in order to for the engine to dispatch a message to a specific process (or possibly create a process instance).

Method Summary

Method Detail

isCreateInstance

public boolean isCreateInstance(AePartnerLinkOpKey aPartnerLinkOpKey)
Returns a flag indicating if this activity should create the process instance.

Parameters:
aPartnerLinkOpKey - the partner link and operation key
Returns:
boolean flag indicating if the operation is capable of creating the process

getCorrelatedPropertyNames

public java.util.Collection getCorrelatedPropertyNames(AePartnerLinkOpKey aPartnerLinkOpKey)
Returns a List of correlation properties for the given partnerLink, portType and operation. If no list has been set an empty collection will be returned.

Parameters:
aPartnerLinkOpKey - the partner link and operation key

getProcessDef

public AeProcessDef getProcessDef()
Gets the process definition.

isSuspendProcessOnUncaughtFaultEnabled

public boolean isSuspendProcessOnUncaughtFaultEnabled()
Return true if the process should be suspended if it encounters an uncaught fault.
